prompt: Write email to my POC name garima vermas telling her that i am not able to come to office because of the personal reasons now write this in a profesional way.

sections.heading: Body:
sections.content:
Dear Garima Verma,

Please accept this email as notification that I will be unable to come to the office today, [Date], due to personal reasons.

I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. I will have limited access to email. If anything urgent arises, please contact [Colleague's Name] at [Colleague's Email Address] or [Colleague's Phone Number].

I expect to be back in the office on [Date of Return]. I will catch up on any missed work upon my return.

Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Job Title]
[Your Contact Number]
